text: (nabiye!) obata satyaya vu puvata læbunu pasuvada, me gæna oba veta kavurun ho tarka kalahot, (ovunta) oba mes kiyanu: “enu, api apage daruvanvada, obage daruvanvada, apage bharyayavanda, obage bharyayavanda, apavada, obavada kændava (ekarasi kara) tabagena, sæmadenama (tama tamange kiyaman satyaya yayi) divra, ‘(meyata venas akarayakata pavasana) borukarayan kerehi allahge sapaya at veva!’ yayi prarthana karamu” (yayi pavasana men niyoga kaleya. mese nabi tumanan ovunva aradhana kala avasthavedi kisivekut mese divrimata idiripat vuve næta)
